fullName.description: The first name, any middle names, and surname of a person.

firstName.description: The given name of the person.

middleInitial.description: The first letter of the person's middle name.

email.description: An electronic mail address for the person.

affiliations.description: The organizations to which the person is associated with.

roles.description: The roles assumed by a person, ideally from a controlled vocabulary/ontology.

extraProperties.description: Extra properties that do not fit in the previous specified attributes.

identifier.description: A code uniquely identifying an entity locally to a system or globally.

identifierSource.description: The identifier source represents information about the organisation/namespace responsible for minting the identifiers. It must be provided if the identifier is provided.

alternate_identifier_info_schema.json.title: DATS alternate identifier information schema
alternate_identifier_info_schema.json.description: Information about an alternate identifier (other than the primary).

identifier.description: An identifier or identifiers other than the primary Identifier applied to the resource being registered. (definition from DataCite)

identifierSource.description: The identifier source represents information about the organisation/namespace responsible for minting the identifiers. It must be provided if the identifier is provided.

related_identifier_info_schema.json.title: DATS related identifier information schema
related_identifier_info_schema.json.description: Information about an idenfier of related resources.

identifier.description: An identifier of a related resource.

identifierSource.description: The identifier source represents information about the organisation/namespace responsible for minting the identifiers. It must be provided if the identifier is provided.

relationType.description: The type of the relationship corresponding to this identifier.

annotation_schema.json.title: DATS annotation schema
annotation_schema.json.description: A pair of value (string or numeric) with a corresponding ontology term (IRI), if applicable.

value.description: The value of the annotation - it can be a string or a number (for coded values).

valueIRI.description: The IRI of a concept or ontology term associated with the value. It can also be an empty string

organization_schema.json.title: DATS organization schema
organization_schema.json.description: Legal or physical entity corresponding to a business or administration.

abbreviation.description: The shortname, abbreviation associated to the organization.

location.description: The place where the organization is located.

roles.description: The roles of the organization (ideally from a controlled vocabulary/ontology).

extraProperties.description: Extra properties that do not fit in the previous specified attributes.

place_schema.json.title: DATS place schema
place_schema.json.comment: It corresponds to Feature in GeoJSON, https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946, geoLocation in DataCite,http://schema.datacite.org/meta/kernel-4.0/ and Place in schema.org

description.description: A textual narrative comprised of one or more statements describing the place.

coordinates.description: A non-empty list of GeoJSON positions.

category_values_pair_schema.json.title: DATS extension mechanism
category_values_pair_schema.json.description: Extension mechanism for DATS, which allows to add extra properties to the entities. It should be used only for cases where there are no specific properties to deal with the desired property.

category.description: A characteristic or property about the entity this object is associated with.

categoryIRI.description: The IRI corresponding to the category, if associated with an ontology term.

values.description: A set of (annotated) values associated with the cateogory.

source_schema.json.title: MIACA Source - corresponding to a person and their organization
source_schema.json.description: Contact details of researcher/person/laboratory/institution in charge of the project -Used to describe the contact details of the scientist - corresponds to MIACA XSD sourceType

name.description: name of the researcher working on the project.

institution.description: name of the institution/affiliation the researcher is working at
